reviews: We stayed five nights and the service was great from Didier, Daniel to Roberto the server. All the staff is kind and helpful and their breakfast food is really good. We are definitely staying here again.

This hotel was amazing staff were very welcoming and attentive to your needs especially danny and dider were always more then willing to help if you had any questions or give you recommendations on the good spots around the area and we really appreciated it. The rooms were very clean and comfortable they had a mini fridge filled with complimentary water,juice and soda as well complimentary toiletries such as toothpaste, mouth wash, razor, shaving cream ect more then other hotels I have stayed at when they cleaned the room they also did an amazing job. Another things that was nice was that on every floor they had a mini fridge with complimentary water and fresh apples, not to mention free breakfast and they actually had a nice variety of food, drinks and pastries as well as a 24

We had the most wonderful stay at Historico Central. From the moment we arrived the service was so good, the staff were very friendly, professional, kind and happy. The room was spacious and clean and the bed was so comfortable. The breakfasts were delicious, fresh juices and delicious items from the menu, our favourite was the Huevos Divorciadas.  The cafe provides complimentary refreshments to guests 24 hours a day, which really is above and beyond.  The hotel is nearby lots of sights, restaurants and shops and is very easy to get to from the airport.  I don’t think I could rate this hotel highly enough, everyone was wonderful and we hope to return. Thank you for an amazing stay! I have also put this review on hotels.com but wanted it to reach more people.

This hotel is amazing, not just for its beauty and cleanliness but mostly for the amazing staff they have here. Danny and Didier were amazing in helping us with anything we needed at the front as well as Jorge and Don Luis. The front desk ladies Laila and Andrea were especially welcoming and eager to help with anything! The kitchen staff Luis, Gonzalo, Arturo, Roberto, Andreas, and Guadeloupe were especially attentive and made our mornings very enjoyable, we have never eaten so well! If you want a great Mexican city experience  or never visited here before, this would be a great booking to make. Thank you!

My name is Sofya and I’m from Moscow, Russia. This April me and my family’ve arrived to Mexico City for vacations , we spent our first 5  days in the historical centre of Mexico City. It was really wonderful time for us because we stayed in your good hotel. Historico Central is a small boutique- hotel, situated in the building with the 200 years history! The hotel is absolutely great - first of all, because of its wonderful personnel. All of them ( I’ m very sorry not to be able to mention here all the names!!!!) are really the people who are making you happy and relaxed every minute of your staying at the Historico Central: all the ladies at the front desk, estimado Armando - always so much helpful! Then - due to its location , interiors , so much tasty meal and amazing spirit

We had a great stay! The best part are the amazing and kind staff.  Great touches throughout including complimentary water and apple on every floor, all inclusive 24 hour access to the cafe. We really enjoyed the great service at breakfast and can’t say enough good things about Luis, Arturo, Gonzalo and Robert. Also the gentlemen who greeted us so warmly at the door and always helped us out with everything (Didier and Daniel). The ladies at the front desk are all so warm and welcoming! Thank you for all the staff for making our stay extra special and memorable

The hotel is incredibly clean inside and out..the staff is very attentive to all your needs.. concierge is very courteous and friendly..from the bellboys to the staff on the café to the cleaning staff and housekeeping...just above and beyond excellent service.. breakfast is always included and very very good, all made from scratch. The best part of our morning breakfast however was the 4 guys that are serving: Luis, Gonzalo, Arturo and Roberto. Aside from being very attentive to ALL the tables, they had a great personality. Very pleasant guys to get along with. After a week's stay we got to know each other by our first names and had us laughing early in the morning which kicked off our day in a happy way.. One thing I did notice is that the other hotel guests treated the servers

The staff was exceptional from start to finish. The accommodations were top notch. Our stay included breakfast every day and the staff Roberto, Arturo and Luis were there to serve amd made our stay that much better. The food was excellent and the service at the deli also great. I would recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

We came to Mexico City for the MLB Padres Series.  We were here five days with family and friends.  We had three rooms.  Every single aspect of service was exceptional at Hotel Historico Central.  We were greeted by Daniel and he was so helpful, friendly, provided options when we asked about different activities and asked about the Padre game both nights!  The front desk checked us in quickly and were always helpful!  Even though we were early they ensured we were comfortable and expedited the rooms.  The mango Tequila shot was a great welcoming touch. The 24 hour cafe was great with coffees, juice, sandwiches, salads, soup and more included in our stay.  They had beer and wine too!  The morning breakfast was made to order and better than some meals we had in town. We had a

Highly recommend this hotel. From them arranging for an airport pick-up at 1AM at airport to every morning being met with an amazing breakfast and wonderful coffee served with care and genuine interest by Luis, Roberto. y Arturo (a real bonus to staying here).. Take the walking tour!!! First day. We would never have learned and seen as many details and history otherwise!! Last but not least, the most comfortable beds ever!

Historico Central is a wonderful hotel in a very good location.  Everyone working at this hotel is so very nice and helpful.  The included breakfast is extremely good.  Shout out to Luis and Roberto A F.  They were both so very attentive at breakfast.  I looked forward to breakfast each day.  There is also a 24-hour cafe with good soup, sandwiches, snacks, and assorted beverages, that is also included.  I would definitely stay here again.

Wonderful and most friendly hotel ever!! Incredible service, we were taken such good care of. The food was great, and the staff went above and beyond. We were there during a birthday, and they even sang and brought out a dessert for the birthday boy.

From the arrival until check-out everything was just perfect! Spacy, clean rooms, the food and specially the friendliness of all the employees. They all made us feel very welcome!  Special thanks as well to the waiters in the restaurant during breakfast; Roberto, Luis, Gónzalo and Arturo....all of them were very professional!  I almost forgot an important detail.....as the name says it.....the hotel is very central in Mexico City. Everything in walking distance!  Thanks to everybody at the Historico Central Hotel, we will be back!!!

The hotel was great, super clean, friendly staff and delicious food. Luis and Roberto at breakfast gave us fantastic service! They made sure every day started with a huge smile. The cafe is open 24/7, reception staff were knowledgeable and always ready to help.

Hotel is located on a not-too-busy street in the historic central district of Mexico City.  The rooms are modern and neat but not overdone.  The rooms are well-equipped with bathroom items and an expresso/coffee maker.  Included breakfast is quite nice and the breakfast service is prompt and polite.  No restaurant per se, but there is a small cafe at the front open 24 hours a day with such items as coffee, soft drinks, light meals (tortas, paninis, salads and soups all gratis for hotel quests.  Beer and wine are also available.  Concierge and front desk service are knowledgeable and efficient.  Daily room cleaning service is excellent.  Close to all the sites of the Historic Center with a daily walking tour with a most knowledgeable guide.  Great value.

Beautiful hotel and great location right in the middle of historic downtown Mexico City. We stayed for a week. The staff were wonderful right from start until finish.  The breakfast waiters Luis, Roberto, Joss, Arturo, and Gonzalo made sure we had a great start to each day.  The people at the front desk, Andrea, Ana, Amsi, Axel and Erick went out of their way to make us feel welcome.  The baggage porter (whose name we unfortunately forgot) was also incredibly helpful. Thank you for a wonderful week and helping us celebrate achieving my doctoral degree.  We look forward to returning one day.

Incredible experience here for me and my mom! The location is perfection for walking around (zocalo, Torre Latino, Bellas Artes). We even walked down la Reforma from Bellas Artes to the independence ángel and kept going into Chapultepec and saw the castle. Lots of walking but easy to do and plenty to see. Uber is super easy to catch outside of this hotel if that’s what you prefer and we did that a few times. The staff at this hotel is second to none. All staff is friendly, knowledgeable about the area and always willing to listen and help out. (I speak Spanish but they speak English for those that don’t speak the local language). They arranged transportation three different times for us and each time our driver was right where they needed to be at the precise time. Cafe food and

This was my first trip out of the country and I was reasonably nervous. I speak little Spanish and was concerned I wouldn’t be able to navigate. The front desk manager and support staff was very helpful in this, assisting to book transportation and working with reliable vendors to ensure you are never lost. They go one step further and confirm prices you paid to ensure their vendors are authentic.  When we arrived front desk staff was very welcoming. Dedier was the first person we met. He helped with out bags and did his best to learn our names. Next was Carlos and his partner at the cafe who was very friendly. The cafe itself was extremely reliable and delicious with good choices - all as part of the package. The breakfast staff was probably my favorite part Luis, Roberto,

Our stay at Historico Central was a very pleasant one. The position of the hotel is perfect, close to all the main spots. The room was super clean, the breakfast was amazing with fresh dishes being prepared upon order. The 24/7 cafeteria was very convenient. The best part of our stay was the super friendly staff, especially Luis who was very helpful.

Best hotel service in the world. We had such a great experience in this hotel. Everyone is so helpful. The valet parking and the cafe service is amazing. The ladies at the reception helped us so much, got me a make up artist within a couple of hours and tailoring & laundry services for my husband. And definitely one of the best food services, they have a ton of things included: water, drinks, salads, etc. Special thank you to Arturo, Gonzalo, Roberto and Luis for making every breakfast a joyful and great experience. We will be returning very soon!

Wonderful staff. Fantastic location. The 24 hour cafe is such a luxury. The restaurant staff are great...Roberto, Luis, Gonzalo and the rest are awesome! Service with a smile, remarkably efficient and always eager to please. We'll be back for sure!

My husband and I stayed at the Hotel Historico Central in Mexico City for four nights and this hotel was fantastic. The staff was so helpful and friendly. I cannot overstate how excellent the food was. The service from all of the staff members we engaged with during our stay was wonderful; we especially enjoyed the great service from Roberto and Luis each morning when they served us breakfast. The excellent customer service as well as the value and convenience of being able to quickly grab a bite to eat any time of day or night really were highlights of our stay.  It was also great to have access to as much cold bottled water as we needed. This was our first visit to Mexico City, and we wanted to be close to the main historic sites in town. The hotel has a very convenient

I love this hotel! From the moment you enter you feel welcomed . The attention to detail is appreciated very much! I have stayed at this hotel several times and I keep returning because I feel safe, taken care of and very comfortable. All the staff is friendly and always ready to provide any support needed. In our case, Bety stood out. She is friendly, professional and our room was impecable! I cannot wait to return.

I can't say enough about the service and friendliness of staff.  When you go to breakfast, definitely try to get Luis.  When entering for breakfast, the staff immediately brings fruit, yogurt, and coffee.  The amenities and room was great and the location was perfect.  I will definitely stay again when I return.

Hotel Historico Central is one of the best hotel's I've stayed at in a long time.  It is in the heart of Mexico City's historic district, has a wonderful breakfast, free water & apples & snacks and is a comfortable, beautiful hotel. I want to specifically thank Ulises and Didier for the great service they provided during our stay.  They always had a smile on their faces.

The hotel is in a great location for visiting the Central neighborhood, clean, comfortable, and architecturally interesting with the open courtyard and living wall of greenery. Truly friendly and helpful staff, great breakfast, and 24 hour available coffee bar. Shout out to the entire staff especially Ulises and Atenea for extra attention and help! Will definitely come back and recommend to everyone

Small but well kept hotel. Staff are very gracious and make sure your needs are taken care of.  Breakfast is included with snack and sandwiches available all day long. Courtesy beer and coffee is available all day long.  Baskets of delicious apples are available on all floors and coolers with drinking water. Kudos for Chef Jose Luis, and staff like Roberto  A.F. and Arturo and Gonzalo.

Historical central staff and service has been the best I’ve ever experienced.  The building & rooms are beautifully decorated. The hotel is perfectly located and we were able to find everything nearby.  Particularly loved the bottled water and apples are made available to us during our entire stay.

First, the hotel staff was awesome.  Andrea, at the front desk, was amazing.  From booking trips to answering questions, she was ever present and ready.  The dining room staff were well trained and helpful-and the breakfasts were delicious.  The room we had was updated and clean with a great coffee/espresso machine.  The location was perfect for us as we could walk around the corner and quickly get to the City center-Zocalo.  The bed was one of the most comfortable we'd experienced.  Awesome place that we'd recommend.

On our first visit to Mexico, we were glad we stayed at Historico Central. The staff was extraordinarily gracious and professional.  They served a great hearty breakfast which included traditional Mexican cuisine.  Special thanks to the server Luis for his outstanding hospitality!

I had a great stay! The staff was extremely accommodating and attentive. It was a friendly environment that was really enjoyable. The breakfast was delicious and servers were awesome and welcoming. Luis was my favorite server, he always greeted us with a smile for breakfast. I had a great stay here.

We reserved two rooms for our stay. We loved it. The hotel is small but just perfect. Very clean, and in a great location. The employees were extremely attentive and there was always someone around asking if everything was okay. They have couches on every floor, right by the main elevator where people can sit and relax. They also have refrigerators with cold water bottles for us to grab as we please. They have breakfast every morning, 7-11am. It includes fruit, yogurt, coffee, fresh squeezed orange juice and a menu to choose from. I had chilaquiles and huevos rancheros and they were delicious. Their 24/7 cafe is also very convenient and the fact that’s included in our stay it was a plus. It was completely free of cost and we got coffee, smoothies, pannininies, etc. Everyone was

Our stay was a delight. Super accommodation and great staff. Atenea in reception was very knowledgeable and  helpful organising trips and providing local information.   Tourist sites and restaurants conveniently nearby.

This is truly one of the best hotels I've stayed in ever.  The service is top notch, the staff are the best around.  I'm so glad to have stayed here this past weekend. Checked in on Wednesday and got dropped off in the pouring rain.  Staff was out there with an umbrella to help us in and get our luggage from the uber. Atenea, our concierge greeted us at the desk with a welcome cocktail and amazing service.  She made small talk and asked why we were in visiting.  We said we're from San Diego and here to see the city as well as perform with the Coro Gay Ciudad de Mexico that weekend (important to know). I checked into my room which had a little balcony that opened to the front of the hotel.  A handwritten card was on the bed with some candy and from Ingrid the general manager. The

From the moment we arrived at Historico Central the service and attention was exceptional: Personalized notes in the room. The room (with a small balcony) was perfect: clean, bath robes, stocked (free) beverages in the fridge. The complimentary breakfast menu was exceptionally nice. The staff were kind, caring, attentive. The food/coffee bar at the entrance of the hotel (open 2/24 and mostly complimentary) was really nice. All the staff (front desk, food servers, concierge, etc) was wonderfully present; Carlos, Jazmin, Dedier, are some of the names that come to mind. The woman who cleaned my room was also really wonderful (I wish I could remember her name). I've travelled a lot and I can confidently say that Historico Central has been the best hotel experience I've ever had.

My wife and I so thoroughly enjoyed our 5 night stay at Hotel Historico Central. Our first time in Mexico City and staying at Hotel Historico Central enabled the trip for our 42 anniversary to be a resound8 g success. The quality of the staff is superior, with cordial communication and efficiency a hallmark of the truly excellent service. We so appreciated the 24 hour cafe at Hotel Historico Central - the provision of sandwiches and drinks on request at no extra cost was exceedingly appreciated.  We will definitely return to Hotel Historico Central. Thank you for making our 42 anniversary such a wonderful experience and memory making event.

This was my third stay at the hotel and the only hotel I have ever felt was worth this price. The rooms are quiet and comfortable. The staff are nice and amazing. The breakfast is good, the Cafe is convenient and decent. Monse and Adison took very good care of us in the Cafe even with food allergies (I hope I got the names right). The front desk staff, bell staff, and concierge staff have all been amazing on all of our stays.

Staff was very friendly and attentive. Front desk staff would always go above and beyond to make us feel welcome and answer any relevant questions/ arrange any tours needed. The walking tour was an especially great kickoff to our week long stay in Mexico city. Luis and Alberto in the breakfast lounge always made us feel well attended and ensured we had the best breakfast experience. Loved the options at the Cafe (sometimes we choose eating at the Cafe over eating out!l) rooms were big and comfortable and wifi was good enough to take video calls.   Definitely recommend this hotel and will be staying here again on my next trip to Mexico city

Absolutely amazing hotel! Located moments from the Zocalo square in the heart of historic Mexico City. Within walking distance of the Templo Mayor Museum, The National Cathedral, the National Palace and Bellas Artes. Two blocks from a Metro Station.  The best service I have ever had. The entire staff goes out of their way to make you feel like family. The complimentary breakfast is beyond compare that includes fresh fruit, yoghurt, pastries, coffee, juices and a la carte Mexican and American dishes. Roberto, Gonzalo and Luis were superb! I had a stomach issue and they all went out of their way to make sure I got better. Daniel, our concierge greeted us every day, offering suggestions and asking about our plans. The front desk staff made you feel appreciated and welcome the

We had a great vacation at Historico Central. We stayed for 5 days and we are already making plans to return next year. Service was excellent from the front desk to the housekeepers. We love the free breakfast and the waiters Luis, Roberto, Gonzalo and Arturo rendered 5 star service consistently.  The Central Coffee Shop with free sandwiches was also a big plus. The head Concierge, Rebecca, was so helpful and really professional. The free walking tour was not too tiresome for seniors like us. All in all we just love Historico Central!

What a great hotel. It’s in an absolutely amazing location, close to so many things we wanted to see in Mexico City. The vibe is both historical and also very modern. Great staff. Glad we stayed here!

My wife and I stayed at the Historico Central June 10-17, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The location is very good, just a few blocks to the Zocalo, Palacio de Bellas Artes, the Allende subway stop, and many fine restaurants are nearby.   The hotel was clean, and services very good.  Breakfast was included with the room and was excellent.  The 24-hour cafe was a nice option, with a complimentary menu of food and soft drinks, beer and wine also are  available for a charge.  An especially impressive attraction was the two-story wall of plants in the lobby/breakfast area.  The rooms are simple and stylish.  We were especially impressed by the wide-screen television mounted on the wall, in a three-inch wooded frame. The only negative feature of the room for us (on the second

Our stay here was one of the best we’ve ever had anywhere we’ve been, from check in to check out. The friendliness of the staff, whether it be the front desk, servers, bellhops, housekeeping, etc. was incomparable. They all make you feel you are as important as family and will bend over backwards to meet your needs. The location is great, being in the center of town with endless activities around the area, including tours. Speaking of, the hotel offers a free 3-4 hour tour during your stay, which touches all the main points in the immediate downtown/Zocalo area. It was great to hear the history and current standing of the city from very knowledgeable and entertaining guides. They are offered in both English and Spanish for any language barriers you may feel you’ll encounter.

Our family had an amazing 4 night stay at Hotel Historico Central. Rooms and hotel were very cozy and exceptionally clean with comfortable beds. The location of the hotel is within walking distance to El Zocalo, Madero Street, Palacio Bellas Artes, restaurants and shops. We felt very safe walking at any time during the day even at night. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful with all our questions especially Daniel and Deidier. Luis and Roberto in the dining room were a pleasure to have as we started our mornings with breakfast.  The hotel cafe which included snacks and drinks was a very nice touch after returning from long days exploring the city. A couple times we encountered Monserrat in the cafe to be a little moody. Possibly just having a bad day. Luis however was

This hotel is amazing!  The rooms are very comfortable, the location is convenient to everything in the central historic district, the staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, and the price is incredible for what you get.  The price includes a delicious breakfast daily, as well as sandwiches, salads, soups, juices and beers for no extra charge.  Be sure to take advantage of the FREE walking tour offered daily by a very knowledgeable guide, which was a great way to get oriented and learn about the history of Mexico City.

The service is excellent. Andrea at the front desk and Roberto in the restaurant made sure we got everything we needed and they were more than willing to go the extra mile to ensure our stay was impeccable. We are grateful for them and they made the trip memorable.  Overall, the hotel is clean and modern in a nice part of the city. They had an abundance of bottled water, and every floor had a fridge full of bottled water, which I thought was a nice touch. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel and especially the staff.

A great hotel, and very affordable considering the amenities. Price includes a workout gym, free bottled water, snacks, and breakfast from 7 to 11. The breakfast was delicious and offered a wide variety of choices, all of them delish. The staff of Luis, Roberto, Goncal, and Joseline were excellent, as were the bellboys Ulisis and Didier. There's a free walking tour and the front desk will arrange for taxis and make sure you're not overcharged.  A great experience all around!

Me and four friends came to CDMX for a chorus concert. This hotel was home to us for 5 days: the lobby is beautiful and you get a welcome drink upon arrival.  Throughout the stay, the free cafe drinks and food were a HUGE plus, as well as the in-depth walking tour that is included. I felt comfortable at all times, and the room was clean and had everything we needed.  The staff is next-level. They treated us like royalty, even spent time getting to know us and about our performances. One of the staff even went to our show to support us. After a long concert day, we came home to handwritten notes and gifts of congratulations. I have never been treated so well by any hotel, ever. Please do yourself a favor and experience this wonderful oasis in the middle of Mexico City. The perks

Luis, Roberto, Arthur, Gonealo, and Joselin was exceptional!!!!!! I felt really safe in this hotel and the crew that I mention above along with the Whole Historico Central Staff was amazing, being young women traveling together, we felt safe, and seen! Anything that we wanted they went out of their way to accommodate us. I will recommend this staff and this hotel to anyone. Amazing amazing amazing!!!!

Enjoy every moment of my stay. The staff are polite and genuinely kind. I came to Mexico City for the first time with my friends and we arrived late due to flight delay and we were accommodated in every way. The walking tour is amazing and more than I expected. I could go on and on about the staff at this hotel.
